name: Party
description:
n people came to a party. Then those, who had no friends among people at the
party, left. Then those, who had exactly 1 friend among those who stayed, left
as well. Then those, who had exactly 2, 3, ..., n - 1 friends among those who
stayed by the moment of their leaving, did the same. What is the maximum
amount of people that could stay at the party in the end? Input The first
input line contains one number t — amount of tests (1 ≤ t ≤ 10^5). Each of the
following t lines contains one integer number n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5). Output For
each test output in a separate line one number — the maximum amount of people
that could stay in the end. Examples Input 1 3 Output 1
